scenario: In the family kitchen, Agent A, a teenager, prepares cookies with Agent B and Agent C around. Agent C has dietary restrictions and looks tentatively at the cookies.

Agent A proposes splitting the last cookie if there's an argument.

scenario: In a family living room, Agent A, a teenager, is seated at a big table filled with art supplies. Agent A decides to clear the table, organizing the supplies so that everyone has equal access to the materials.

Agent A starts a discussion about what music to play, seeking a consensus to ensure the ambiance suits everyone.

Agent A offers to frame Agent B's completed painting, recognizing their effort and dedication.
